entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
